org.microbean.jersey.netty

Class SimpleContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.jersey.netty.SimpleContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container

    public class SimpleContainer
extends Object
implements Container
    A straightforward Container implementation that is not actually needed for Jersey integration.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    Container

      • SimpleContainer

        public SimpleContainer(ApplicationHandler applicationHandler)
        Creates a new SimpleContainer.
        Parameters:
        applicationHandler - the ApplicationHandler that actually does the work of hosting an application; may be null in which case a new ApplicationHandler will be used instead
